title: Hydroponics Growing System, 12 Pods Hydroponics Growing System Indoor Garden with LED Grow Light, Height Adjustable Indoor Gardening System, Hydroponic Growing System Built-in Timer Function
descriptions:
Product Name: Hydroponics Growing System, 12 Pods Indoor Garden with LED Grow Light

Introducing our state-of-the-art Hydroponics Growing System, an ideal solution for those who want to cultivate their own plants indoors. This system comes equipped with 12 pods, making it perfect for growing a variety of plants simultaneously.

Key Features:

1. **LED Grow Light**: Utilizing advanced SMD LED technology, our grow light boasts a power of 25W. With its full-spectrum feature, it provides 30% more luminous flux than traditional lights, thereby speeding up plant growth by up to 5 times.

2. **Water Circulation System**: Our system employs the Advanced Deep Flow technique, ensuring water circulation every 30 minutes. This not only keeps the water fresh and clean but also operates at a low noise level, ensuring minimal disturbance.

3. **Water Tank**: With a capacity of 4L, our water tank provides self-sufficient growth for up to 18 days. It also includes a water level gauge for easy monitoring and a larger space for roots, promoting healthier plant growth.

4. **Adjustable Height**: The system's extendable rod height can be adjusted up to 17.78 inches, accommodating various plant types.

5. **Package Contents**: The package includes 1 Hydroponics System, 1 set of Plant Food A & B, 12 Planting Hats, 12 Planting Baskets, 12 Biochar Mud, 1 Adapter, and 1 Manual.

6. **Warranty and Support**: We offer a 360-day warranty period and provide available after-sales service for your peace of mind.

Experience the joy of gardening indoors with our Hydroponics Growing System. Whether you're a seasoned gardener or a beginner, this system is designed to make plant cultivation easy and efficient. Order yours today!
